original_text: But Egypt will be empty, and Edom will become a desert. They attacked the people in Judah, and they killed them for no good reason. But Egypt will be empty, and Edom will become a desert. They attacked the people in Judah, and they killed them for no good reason. But Egypt will be empty,
korean_text: 그러나 애굽은 황무지가 되겠고 에돔은 황무한 들이 되리니 이는 그들이 유다 자손에게 포악을 행하여 무죄한 피를 그 땅에서 흘렸음이니라

sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이집트는 텅 비게 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: and Edom will become a desert
They attacked the people in Judah
and they killed them for no good reason
